home.transform: Transforming Underwriting Process with Big Data and A.I.
home.desc: Acura Labs helps financial institutions by providing reliable information for better financial decisions

point1.content: Low penetration of bank financial product is caused by the lack of data coverage, and we are here to start increasing it.

point2.content: Empowering bank in having automated know-your-customer and application process.

aboutUs.title: We Work with User Privacy in Mind
aboutUs.subtitle: We respect the privacy by having one time only access after the user gave their consent and not storing their password.

point1.content: User will be asked to connect their digital accounts & giving consent for us to access.

point2.content: Then Acura Labs will processes the data and generate reports for respective partner.

point3.content: Based on the generated reports, you can use it for loan underwriting and approval decision.

point1.content: We capture alternative data and used machine learning to reach the underserved market.

point2.content: We automate the verification of personal information, address, and income.

alternativeData.title: Alternative Data for Better Financial Decision
alternativeData.subtitle: Our data layer engine help financial institutions and business partners to reduce risk by providing individuals daily transactional data

point1.content: Balance, Income, Transaction Detail, Transfer List, Credit Card Information
